summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin Dashboard refactored components. All backend APIs (10/10 tests) and frontend UI functionalities are working correctly. Login flow, Overview tab, Jobs tab with CRUD, and Applications tab with detail dialog and status updates all tested successfully.
passed_tests: Jobs list via GET /api/jobs-session (2 jobs found)
Job CRUD: Create, Update, Delete via /api/jobs-session
Applications list via GET /api/applications-session (1 application found)
Overview tab renders with correct stats (2 jobs, 1 application, 1 pending)
Jobs tab shows listings with Edit/Delete buttons
Add Job button opens job form dialog with all fields
Applications tab shows clickable application cards with filter and search
Application detail dialog shows applicant info (Budi Santoso)
Status dropdown in detail dialog works with all options
seed_data_creation: Reset application status back to 'pending' after testing status update
context_for_next_testing_agent: AdminDashboard.jsx was refactored from 1100-line monolithic file into 6 smaller components: OverviewTab, JobsTab, ApplicationsTab, JobFormDialog, AppDetailDialog. All components tested and working. Session-based auth using cookies (not JWT). Existing data: 2 jobs (Admin - published, Senior Developer - draft), 1 application (Budi Santoso for Senior Developer, status: pending).

overview_tab.recent_applications_section: Shows Budi Santoso - Senior Developer - pending
